text: Was a good and funny movie to watch with family

Some great gags, some of the best in any Despicable Me franchise, or spinoff. Especially the kung fu scene 🤣
È così stupido (tanto per farvi capire ad un certo punto ad una persona sbucano altre quattro mani così a caso) che è quasi bello.
Second best of the franchise

Fantastic, still. Huge fan of this franchise, so there's that ... Loved the retro vibe and some very quirky lines. Amazing visual work, as usual and very well written. Still fast paced and lots of activity. Highly entertaining
It is excellent. The minions were less annoyning and it is funny.
Um filme bastante divertido com a pegada inteligente dos anos 70.

It’s another entertaining minions film what a good plot. Not much to analyze just that it’s a good summer movie to enjoy and pass the time. I think the  despicable franchise is better than the minions, but it’s OK.
It’s a bit funny but there just needs to be more dialogue
An improvement to the first minions movie

Watched it agenst my will cus my teacher put it on 
Good tho
This movie is DA BEST

Wasn’t the best minions movie. It was cute and all, but nothing compared to the original film. I didn’t love the minions role in the movie. They seemed a bit too much like a secondary role. Didn’t seem to help too much at all. I loved Gru. His personality sparked unlike any other character in the film. Loved him, but otherwise, the movie was meh.
Una peli para ver en familia %74🍅
